lead_paragraph: The International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) on Friday formally suspended Russia's eight-strong weightlifting team, effectively excluding it from next month's Rio Olympics, because of doping offences.

headline.print_headline: Russian Weightlifters Barred From Rio Games
headline.main: Russian Weightlifters Barred From Rio Games
